languages.text: "П-правда?" {n}Несчастный явно не верит свои ушам.{/n} "Сию минуту! Ступайте за мной, не отставайте. И ти-и-и-ихо! Кошмары бродят по улицам, уж я знаю! Впереди ждет засада, ступайте осторожнее".

traits.locale_text: "П-правда?" {n}Несчастный явно не верит свои ушам.{/n} "Сию минуту! Ступайте за мной, не отставайте. И ти-и-и-ихо! Кошмары бродят по улицам, уж я знаю! Впереди ждет засада, ступайте осторожнее".

languages.text: "R-really?" {n}The wretch cannot believe his ears.{/n} "Right away! Follow me and don't lag behind. And be very, very quiet! The Nightmares roam the streets, trust me, I know! They will be lying in wait up ahead, so tread carefully."
languages.original_text: "П-правда?" {n}Несчастный явно не верит свои ушам.{/n} "Сию минуту! Ступайте за мной, не отставайте. И ти-и-и-ихо! Кошмары бродят по улицам, уж я знаю! Впереди ждет засада, ступайте осторожнее".

"Right away! Follow me and don't lag behind. And be very, very quiet!"

"R-really?" {n}The wretch cannot believe his ears.{/n} "Right away! Follow me and don't lag behind. And be very, very quiet! The Nightmares roam the streets, trust me, I know! They will be lying in wait up ahead, so tread carefully."

languages.text: “真——真的吗？”{n}这个可怜人不敢相信自己的耳朵。{/n}“我马上出发！跟着我，千万不要掉队，而且一定要非常、非常安静！那些梦魇会在街上游荡，相信我，我知道！他们会在前方埋伏，所以我们一定要非常小心。”
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}The wretch cannot believe his ears.{/n} "Right away! Follow me and don't lag behind. And be very, very quiet! The Nightmares roam the streets, trust me, I know! They will be lying in wait up ahead, so tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: “真——真的吗？”{n}这个可怜人不敢相信自己的耳朵。{/n}“我马上出发！跟着我，千万不要掉队，而且一定要非常、非常安静！那些梦魇会在街上游荡，相信我，我知道！他们会在前方埋伏，所以我们一定要非常小心。”

languages.text: «De... ¿de verdad?». {n}El desdichado apenas cree lo que oye.{/n} «¡Ahora mismo! Sígame y no se retrase. ¡Y no haga nada de ruido! Las pesadillas recorren las calles, créame. ¡Lo sé! Estarán acechando más adelante, así que vaya con cuidado».
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}The wretch cannot believe his ears.{/n} "Right away! Follow me and don't lag behind. And be very, very quiet! The Nightmares roam the streets, trust me, I know! They will be lying in wait up ahead, so tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: «De... ¿de verdad?». {n}El desdichado apenas cree lo que oye.{/n} «¡Ahora mismo! Sígame y no se retrase. ¡Y no haga nada de ruido! Las pesadillas recorren las calles, créame. ¡Lo sé! Estarán acechando más adelante, así que vaya con cuidado».

languages.text: 「ほ、本当ですか？」{n}男は自分の耳を疑っていた。{/n}「すぐに行きましょう！私の後に遅れず付いてきてください。それに、うんと静かにお願いします！悪夢が道を徘徊している、分かるんです！この先で待ち構えていると思うので、慎重に進みましょう」
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}The wretch cannot believe his ears.{/n} "Right away! Follow me and don't lag behind. And be very, very quiet! The Nightmares roam the streets, trust me, I know! They will be lying in wait up ahead, so tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: 「ほ、本当ですか？」{n}男は自分の耳を疑っていた。{/n}「すぐに行きましょう！私の後に遅れず付いてきてください。それに、うんと静かにお願いします！悪夢が道を徘徊している、分かるんです！この先で待ち構えていると思うので、慎重に進みましょう」

languages.text: "W-wirklich?" {n}Der arme Kerl traut seinen Ohren nicht.{/n} "Sofort! Folgt mir und bleibt nicht zurück. Und seid sehr, sehr leise! Die Albträume streifen durch die Straßen, glaubt mir, ich weiß es! Sie werden auf der Lauer liegen, also seid vorsichtig."
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}The wretch cannot believe his ears.{/n} "Right away! Follow me and don't lag behind. And be very, very quiet! The Nightmares roam the streets, trust me, I know! They will be lying in wait up ahead, so tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: "W-wirklich?" {n}Der arme Kerl traut seinen Ohren nicht.{/n} "Sofort! Folgt mir und bleibt nicht zurück. Und seid sehr, sehr leise! Die Albträume streifen durch die Straßen, glaubt mir, ich weiß es! Sie werden auf der Lauer liegen, also seid vorsichtig."

languages.text: « V-vraiment ? » {n}Le pauvre bougre n'en croit pas ses oreilles.{/n} « Entendu ! Suivez-moi, et ne traînez pas en route. Et surtout, pas un bruit ! Les cauchemars rôdent dans les rues, croyez-moi, j'en sais quelque chose ! Pas de vagues, où ils vous tomberont dessus sans crier gare. »
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}The wretch cannot believe his ears.{/n} "Right away! Follow me and don't lag behind. And be very, very quiet! The Nightmares roam the streets, trust me, I know! They will be lying in wait up ahead, so tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: « V-vraiment ? » {n}Le pauvre bougre n'en croit pas ses oreilles.{/n} « Entendu ! Suivez-moi, et ne traînez pas en route. Et surtout, pas un bruit ! Les cauchemars rôdent dans les rues, croyez-moi, j'en sais quelque chose ! Pas de vagues, où ils vous tomberont dessus sans crier gare. »

languages.text: "Gerçekten mi?" {n}Gariban adam kulaklarına inanamıyor.{/n} "Hemen gidelim! Beni takip edin, arkada kalmayın. Çok ama çok sessiz olun! Kâbuslar her yerde kol geziyor, güvenin bana. Biliyorum! İleride bizi bekliyor olacaklar, dikkatli olun."
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}The wretch cannot believe his ears.{/n} "Right away! Follow me and don't lag behind. And be very, very quiet! The Nightmares roam the streets, trust me, I know! They will be lying in wait up ahead, so tread carefully."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten mi?" {n}Gariban adam duyduklarına inanamıyor.{/n} "Hemen gidelim! Beni takip edin, arkada kalmayın. Çok ama çok sessiz olun! Kâbuslar her yerde kol geziyor, güvenin bana. Biliyorum! İleride bizi bekliyor olacaklar, dikkatli olun."
